DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the long- term safety of F2695-SR in the treatment of adults with major depressive disorder.
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study of F2695 SR in Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: Completed 1 of the leadin studies LVMMD01, LVMMD02, or LVMMD03 Have normal examination findings at the final visit of the leadin study Have a negative serum pregnancy test at the final visit of the leadin study if a woman of childbearing potential Any exclusionary psychiatric or medical condition that developed during the lead in study Patients considered a suicide risk Women who are pregnant, breastfeeding, or planning to become during the study OR are sexually active and not currently using a medically acceptable method of contraception
